alert.note: Alert for Southwest Interior; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:31PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lewis...south central Thurston and southwestern Pierce Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 530 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Yelm, or 20 miles east of Centralia, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Lewis...south central Thurston and southwestern Pierce Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Interior; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
